data.name: TableBorder2
desc: contains the style settings of the border lines of all cells in a cell range.
TableBorder2 is nearly identical to TableBorder, except that it has members of BorderLine2 instead of BorderLine.
In a queried structure, the flags in TableBorder2.Is...LineValid indicate that not all lines of the boxes have the same values.
In a structure which is used for setting, these flags determine if the corresponding line should be set or if the old value should be kept.

items.name: TopLine
lines: determines the line style at the top edge.

items.name: IsTopLineValid
lines: specifies whether the value of TableBorder2.TopLine is used.

items.name: BottomLine
lines: determines the line style at the bottom edge.

items.name: IsBottomLineValid
lines: specifies whether the value of TableBorder2.BottomLine is used.

items.name: LeftLine
lines: determines the line style at the left edge.

items.name: IsLeftLineValid
lines: specifies whether the value of TableBorder2.LeftLine is used.

items.name: RightLine
lines: determines the line style at the right edge.

items.name: IsRightLineValid
lines: specifies whether the value of TableBorder2.RightLine is used.

items.name: HorizontalLine
lines: determines the line style of horizontal lines for the inner part of a cell range.

items.name: IsHorizontalLineValid
lines: specifies whether the value of TableBorder2.HorizontalLine is used.

items.name: VerticalLine
lines: determines the line style of vertical lines for the inner part of a cell range.

items.name: IsVerticalLineValid
lines: specifies whether the value of TableBorder2.VerticalLine is used.

items.name: Distance
lines: contains the distance between the lines and other contents.

items.name: IsDistanceValid
lines: specifies whether the value of TableBorder2.Distance is used.
